actions.committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities. subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

official_title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to protect elected and appointed judges against discrimination based on age.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to revise the definition of "employee," for purposes of the Act, with regard to persons elected or appointed to judicial office.

titles.title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to protect elected and appointed judges against discrimination based on age.
